user.title: User
user.description: Represents a user in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

joinedClubs.description: An array of club IDs that the user has joined.

profilePicURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

description.description: A brief description of the club.

bannerImage.description: URL of the club's banner image.

events.description: An array of event IDs organized by the club.

genres.description: An array of genres associated with the club.

coreVolunteers.description: An array of user IDs for core volunteers.

membersCount.description: The number of members in the club.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the club was created.

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

date.description: The date and time of the event.

clubId.description: The ID of the club organizing the event.

bannerImage.description: URL for the event's banner image.

mediaURLs.description: An array of URLs for media associated with the event.

recurring.description: Details about the event's recurring schedule.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the event was created.

galleryItem.title: Gallery Item
galleryItem.description: Represents a media item in the gallery.

title.description: The title or caption for the media item.

clubId.description: Optional ID of the club associated with this media.

eventId.description: Optional ID of the event associated with this media.

uploadedAt.description: The timestamp when the gallery item was uploaded.

blogPost.title: Blog Post
blogPost.description: Represents a blog or news post.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

summary.description: A short summary of the blog post.

author.description: The name of the post's author.

date.description: The publication date of the post.

thumbnail.description: URL for the post's thumbnail image.

bannerImage.description: URL for the post's main banner image.

content.description: The HTML content of the blog post.

cloudinaryImage.title: Cloudinary Image
cloudinaryImage.description: Metadata for an image uploaded to Cloudinary.

secure_url.description: The secure HTTPS URL for the uploaded image on Cloudinary's CDN.

public_id.description: The unique identifier for the asset in Cloudinary.

uploadedAt.description: The timestamp when the image was uploaded and metadata was saved.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/events/{eventId}.description: Stores details about upcoming and past events.

/gallery/{galleryId}.description: Collection of all media items for the gallery.

/blog/{blogId}.description: Stores blog posts and news articles.

/uploads/{uploadId}.description: Stores metadata about images uploaded to Cloudinary.
